subject: Re: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hello Derek,  

Thanks for sending this over! You need to log into Flock, go to Admin > Integrations > + Add New Integration > Axon. 

From there, you can fill in the needed information to integrate the APIs. Does this make sense? Let me know if you have any questions!

On Thu, Apr 10, 2025 at 2:18?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	See the response below from our IT department regarding the axon integration.

	
	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov > 
	Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2025 2:17 PM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: RE: Flock - Evidence.com integration

	 

	Yes, these are API settings that I can create.

	 

	I will need to know the proper permissions Flock needs. Here�s an example of the things I can enable:

	 

	 

	Travis Shannon
	Sr. Application Support Technician
	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401
	(541)-682-5806

	 

	From: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > 
	Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2025 14:14
	To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Flock - Evidence.com integration

	 

	Travis,

	 

	When we get ready to link Evidence.com to Flock.  This is the information that we need to make it happen.  Do you have this available?

	 

	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 



-- 



Emily Atzen
Regional Customer Success Manager I



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com
